name: ai-native-cad
description: AI-Native CAD - Electron app for real-time scene.json rendering

scripts.build: npm run build:viewer && node scripts/run-electron-vite.cjs build
scripts.package: npm run prepare:cad-tools && npm run build && electron-builder
scripts.package:mac: npm run prepare:cad-tools && npm run build && electron-builder --mac
scripts.package:win: npm run prepare:cad-tools && npm run build && electron-builder --win
scripts.package:linux: npm run prepare:cad-tools && npm run build && electron-builder --linux
